4303120.name: Disappearance Simulator
4303120.description:
Disappearance Simulator is a first-person crime simulation and management game where you run shady stores, create fake identities, and build an underground operation without getting caught.

After losing your job, you start small with a suspicious shop in a corrupt city. By day, you manage your stores, serve customers, sell fake IDs and illegal services, set prices, and upgrade your operations. As you grow, you unlock and control multiple businesses, each bringing profit, risk, and new opportunities.

By night, you take bigger steps to expand your influence â€” laundering money, bribing the right people, unlocking new locations, and carefully staying ahead of police attention.

Every system is connected. Riskier actions make more money, but they also raise suspicion. Push too far, and the police will investigate. One careless move can shut everything down.

Features

ğŸªª Fake identity creation
Create fake IDs and documents with different quality levels, risks, and consequences.

ğŸª Multi-store management
Own, upgrade, and manage multiple shady businesses across the city.

ğŸš“ Police & suspicion system
Inspections, investigations, bribes, and escalating pressure based on your actions.

ğŸ’° Money laundering & progression
Turn dirty money into expansions, automation, and underground upgrades.

ğŸŒ† A corrupt city to unlock
New locations, new stores, new illegal opportunities.

ğŸŒ“ Day & night gameplay loop
Business management by day. High-risk operations by night.

ğŸƒ Dark humor tone
A stylized, satirical take on crime, power, and corruption.

Stay low. Stay smart. In this city, being noticed is the fastest way to disappear.
